[event]
# Teleport to Laurelia
type=teleport
location=11,31,6,1
intermap=laurelia.txt,91,2

[event]
# Fairy Flower
type=run_once
requires_not=flowerfound
requires_status=elderintro
location=14,15,1,2
hotspot=-16,-16,32,64
loot=id,14,16,199
tooltip=Fairy Flower

[event]
# Teleport to Cavern
type=teleport
requires_status=cavernexplored
location=14,12,2,2
intermap=cavern.txt,61,36
